exercises.text: _____ je ovo? Ovo je moja nova knjiga.
exercises.explanation: Use 'što' or 'šta' (what) when asking about things or objects.
Use 'tko' or 'ko' (who) when asking about people's identity.
Use 'gdje' or 'gde' (where) when asking about location.
Use 'kako' (how) when asking about manner or method.
Use 'kada' or 'kad' (when) when asking about time.

exercises.text: _____ voliš čitati? Volim jer je zanimljivo.
exercises.explanation: Use 'zašto' (why) when asking for reasons or explanations.
